name: Spaceship Madness
description:
You were calmly exploring space... Until you noticed something strange... A broken ship was rushing at you you started to shoot It and destroy it, but more came and you must survive. While trying to survive your ship got damaged quite a bit, but you found a weird glowing orb, you accidentally touch it and your ship restores some of its integrity.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Shoot
